title: problem with masteries

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Hi! I have a problem with my masteries. Every time i pick a mastery page, changing it, deleting one etc. So i have restarted my pc, client and repaired my client several times but nothing happens..... I keep getting the error. Can someone help? Thanks :)

the link is a screenshot of the error message.

replies.body:
This particular issue is usually seen when one or more of your Mastery Pages is corrupted. The common solution I've seen is to delete all of your Mastery Pages, relog, then create them again. 

Let me know if this helps.
